verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: that his meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is set for June 12th in Singapore] .
President Donald Trump announced Thursday that his meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: is] set for June 12th in Singapore .
President Donald Trump announced Thursday that [ARG1: his meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] is [V: set] [ARGM-TMP: for June 12th] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] .
